songs.title: Sweetest Thing
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I, finally met someone
Who has changed my life
Made my lonely days
Sweet again
I, finally have a taste
Of a love so real
I can sing about how I feel

[Pre-Chorus]
He's my sugar, sugar
He's so warm and nice
He's my sugar, sugar

[Chorus]
He's the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
He's the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice

[Verse 2]
I, finally have a chance
Open my heart wide
That you come inside with all your love
You, walk into my life
With one tender kiss
I could not resist all your charm

[Pre-Chorus]
You're my sugar, sugar
You're so warm and nice
You're my sugar, sugar

[Chorus]
You're the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
Sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
You're the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
You're the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice

[Bridge]
Sweetest thing

You're so sweet, baby

[Chorus]
You're the sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
Sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
Sweetest thing
Sugar and the spice
